content: CFS-MSL P Modular Sleeve Frame Complimentary frame for fastening one modular fire sleeve to walls ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Retrofittable replacement plate for use with CFS-MSL Modular Sleeves Includes a set of frames and matching smoke gaskets Integrated and easy-to-access grounding tabs Applications Installing CFS-MSL Modular Sleeves Surface-mounted use on drywall, concrete or masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2345763 - Flange Kit CFS-MSL P L 6x4 (qty2) - Package Size 1 pc - 2345762 - Flange Kit CFS-MSL P M 3x4 (qty2) - Package Size 1 pc - 2345764 - Flange kit CFS-MSL P S 3x2 (qty2) - Package Size 1 pc
